snippet: Intel and Delta reported results that pleased the markets, and oil prices were solidly higher.
abstract: Stock market closes after making modest gain due to rising corporate profits and small rise in oil prices.
lead_paragraph: Intel and Delta reported results that pleased the markets, and oil prices were solidly higher.

headline.main: Strong Earnings and Surge in Oil Drive the Market Up
headline.print_headline: Higher Profits and Oil Prices Give Market a Modest Lift
